programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "bob"
create principal alice "alice"
set x = "x"
set delegation x admin delegate -> bob
set delegation x admin delegate -> alice
return ""
***

as principal alice password "alice" do
set delegation x alice delegate -> bob
return ""
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
set delegation x bob read -> alice
return ""
***

as principal alice password "alice" do
set delegation x alice read -> bob
delete delegation x alice delegate -> bob
return "x"
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
set delegation x bob write -> alice
return x
***
